title: Vegan Mapo Tofu
ingredients: 3 tablespoons fermented black beans, roughly chopped
2  green onions, white parts only, chopped
1 (14 ounce) container silken tofu, cut into 1-inch cubes
method: Step 1: Mix vegetable broth, maple syrup, soy sauce, and cornstarch in a bowl.

Step 2: Heat peanut oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add mushrooms, black beans, green onions, garlic, ginger, and Sichuan peppercorns. Saute until aromatic, about 1 minute. Add chili bean paste and the soy sauce mixture. Cook and stir until thick, 3 to 5 minutes. Add tofu; cook until heated through, about 1 minute more.
Step 3: Transfer cooked tofu to a serving dish; drizzle chile oil and sesame oil on top. Top with chopped peanuts.
Step 4: For a non-vegan version, substitute honey for the maple syrup.
